ISSUE.TITLE: docs: move all configuration docs to a separate chapter and add missing pages
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Current State There must be a clear explanation of all the configuration that Apache APISIX have, preferably under a separate category, currently, the configuration is mixed with other categories and missing a clear explanation. ### Desired State There must be a category that focuses on the following questions/topics: • What are the different types of configuration Apache APISIX needs? • Description of fields and their examples • List of supported/required Environment variables • First party/third party extensions for configuration files(VS Code etc.) • Custom configuration and how to add them • Configuration examples ### Checklist - [ ] Introduction and types of configurations - [ ] List of fields and configuration examples - [ ] Supported environment variables - [ ] Custom Configurations - [ ] Scripts - [ ] Plugin Configuration

COMMIT.MESSAGE: docs: Add configuration docs for apisix and env variables - Added Configuration chapter - Added environment variables docs - Added docs for `apisix` in conf/config-default.yaml - Partially solves #6611 Signed-off-by: Avinal Kumar <avinal.xlvii@gmail.com>
